name: 1Huddle, Inc.
description: Developer of a game-based workforce training platform designed to onboard, upskill, and develop employees. The company's platform converts boring training material into competitive games that are proven to improve employee engagement and performance, enabling businesses to carry out sales and service training and education programs for their employees in a fun and interactive way.
one_liner: Developer of a game-based workforce training platform designed to onboard, upskill, and develop employees. The company's platform converts boring training material into competitive games that are proven to improve employee engagement and performance, enabling businesses to carry out sales and service training and education programs for their employees in a fun and interactive way.
industry: CPG (Consumer packaged goods), Health Tech, SaaS
